response.original_title: 50 years fly: the rise, fall and revolution of hip-hop fashion
response.overview: Just as hip-hop revolutionized music forever, so did the iconic fashion that spun out of it, birthing a legion of savvy, entrepreneurial designers; NBC News looks at how corporate fashion and luxury brands adapted in the streetwear market.
response.title: 50 years fly: the rise, fall and revolution of hip-hop fashion
